articles.title: ‘Captain is not your peon, who'll follow all your commands. Senseless cricket' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A fan had asked about KKR captain Shreyas Iyer's comments on coach and CEO interfering with team selections in IPL 2022. Reacting to that, Butt said a coach can't expect a captain to dance to his tunes.
